description: It's time to get serious about studying but really who wants to study? How boring! The naughty school boys decide it's better to drop the books and have a dirty talking session instead. Things get heated up pretty quickly the 'studying students' Josh Stone and Ian Levine turn the sex talk into a mutual masturbation. Then switching to a wild oral and rimming session with intense orgasms.
title: Dirty Talking Study Buddies
